data.name: MainForm_OpenProject
data.comment: Used in MainForm.openProjBtn_Click() and MainForm.openProjBtn.Text

data.name: MainForm_completeLabel
data.value: This file was marked as complete. If you want to edit it, untick it from the file list.

data.name: MainForm_deleteSelectedToolStripMenuItem_Plural
data.comment: Plural alternative for deleteSelectedToolStripMenu

data.name: MainForm_line
data.comment: Used as a column name in MainForm.listView

data.name: MainForm_proposal
data.comment: Used as a column name in MainForm.listView

data.name: MainForm_WindowTitle
data.comment: Program name - DO NOT CHANGE

data.name: MainForm_PathErrorOrigTran
data.value: Original files path and translated files path do not exist. Check project settings before continuing.
data.comment: Used in MainForm.PathError()

data.name: MainForm_PathErrorOrig
data.value: Original files path does not exist. Check project settings before continuing.
data.comment: Used in MainForm.PathError()

data.name: MainForm_PathErrorTran
data.value: Translated files path does not exist. Check project settings before continuing.
data.comment: Used in MainForm.PathError()

data.name: Generic_Error
data.comment: "Error" window title used while showing an error

data.name: Generic_ProjectFileType
data.comment: Used in MainForm.openProjBtn_Click()

data.name: Generic_Warning
data.comment: "Error" window title used while showing a warning

data.name: MainForm_DeleteLineWarning
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this line?
data.comment: Used in MainForm.delLineBtn_Click()

data.name: MainForm_DeleteLineWarning_Plural
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete these lines?
data.comment: Plural alternative for DeleteLineWarning

data.name: MainForm_OpenNewProjectCopy
data.value: Do you want to open the new copy of the project now?
data.comment: Used in MainForm.saveProjectAsToolStripMenuItem_Click()

data.name: MainForm_IncompleteFiles
data.value: Some files weren't marked as complete. These files will NOT be included in the final report. Are you sure you want to continue?
data.comment: Used in MainForm.generateReportBtn_Click() when trying to generate a report while not all of the files are marked as complete

data.name: Generic_MarkdownFileType
data.comment: Used in MainForm.generateReportBtn_Click()

data.name: MainForm_ReportDestination
data.comment: Used in MainForm.generateReportBtn_Click(), shown when selecting where to save a report

data.name: MainForm_EmptyProjectError
data.value: You can't generate a report right now, since the project is empty.
data.comment: Used in MainForm.generateReportBtn_Click(), error that shows up when trying to generate a report for an empty project.

data.name: MainForm_MarkAsCompleteWarning
data.value: Are you sure you want to mark this file as complete? This operation CAN be undone.
data.comment: Used in MainForm.fileListBox_ItemCheck(), warning shown when trying to mark a file as complete

data.name: MainForm_MarkAsNotCompleteWarning
data.value: Are you sure you want to mark this file as not complete? This operation CAN be undone.
data.comment: Used in MainForm.fileListBox_ItemCheck(), warning shown when trying to mark a file as not complete

data.name: MainForm_UnsavedChanges
data.value: You have unsaved changes in your project. Save?
data.comment: Used in MainForm.CheckUnsaved(), shown when trying to - close the program - trying to open a new project - creating a new project while another one is open while there are unsaved changes in the project.

data.name: GenerateReport_AddingFile
data.comment: Used in GenerateFile.Generate(), shown while generating a report

data.name: GenerateReport_Proposal
data.comment: Used in GenerateFile.Generate(), written to final report

data.name: GenerateReport_PreviousLine
data.comment: Used in GenerateFile.Generate(), written to final report

data.name: GenerateReport_PreviousLine_Plural
data.comment: Used in GenerateFile.Generate(), written to final report

data.name: GenerateReport_Done
data.comment: Used in GenerateFile.Generate(), title of window shown after generating a report

data.name: GenerateReport_DoneMsg
data.comment: Used in GenerateFile.Generate(), shown after generating a report

data.comment: KEEP THE COLON AFTER THE STRING

data.comment: KEEP THE COLON AFTER THE STRING

data.comment: KEEP THE COLON AFTER THE STRING

data.comment: KEEP THE COLON AFTER THE STRING

data.comment: KEEP THE COLON AFTER THE STRING

data.name: ProjectSettings_lastFileLabel
data.comment: KEEP THE COLON AFTER THE STRING

data.name: ProjectSettings_fileSelectBtn
data.comment: KEEP THE THREE DOTS AFTER THE STRING

data.name: ProjectSettings_EmptyProjNameError
data.comment: Used in ProjectSettings.saveBtn_Click(), error shown when trying to save a project with an empty name

data.name: ProjectSettings_ChangedFileListWarning
data.value:
The file list has changed. By saving the project right now, you will lose the comments related to the files which are not in the file list anymore. Are you sure you want to continue?
Clicking "No" will ignore the new file list and the new file paths.
data.comment: Used in ProjectSettings.Save(), warning shown after changing the file list

data.name: NoteEditor_WindowTitle_Add
data.comment: Window title for NoteEditor, shown when adding a new note

data.name: NoteEditor_WindowTitle_Edit
data.comment: Window title for NoteEditor, shown when editing an existing note

data.name: Generic_LineID_Colon
data.comment: KEEP THE COLON AFTER THE STRING

data.name: PrevLinesEditor_WindowTitle_Add
data.comment: Window title for PrevLinesEditor, shown when adding new previous lines

data.name: PrevLinesEditor_WindowTitle_Edit
data.comment: Window title for PrevLinesEditor, shown when editing existing previous lines

data.name: LineEditor_WindowTitle_Add
data.comment: Window title for LineEditor, shown when adding a new line
